Evento não encontrado.
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-evento-landing', templateUrl: './evento-landing.component.html', styleUrls: ['./evento-landing.component.scss'] }) export class EventoLandingComponent implements OnInit { evento: any; constructor( private route: ActivatedRoute, private http: HttpClient ) {} ngOnInit(): void { const slug = this.route.snapshot.paramMap.get('slug'); this.http.get('assets/eventos.json').subscribe(eventos => { this.evento = eventos.find(e => e.slug === slug); }); } }
